items.title: Coffee table
items.description: Hand-carved from solid oak, this table features a smooth finish and sturdy construction. Perfect for any room.

items.title: Console table
items.description: Crafted from reclaimed wood, this console table adds rustic charm to your entryway or living room.

items.title: Shaker box
items.description: This handcrafted shaker box is made from cherry wood and features a traditional design. Perfect for storing small items or as a decorative piece.
